body_html: @yaroslavvb thanks for response. but it seems that tf.pack also just runs in CPU. I am using tf.device to put it in the gpu, but after looking at log_device_placement, it is still pinned to CPU. DO u have any suggestion? I can upload the code if u want it. Thanks
